BR_text.BRsummary: Should count docker errors as transient system errors
BR_text.BRdescription:
Organization Name:
 Microsoft
 Short summary about the issue/question:
 Job failure with dockerd error code  125, not sure the root case. Anyway, this job should get a retry.
 :
 Docker error code list: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/moby/moby/pull/14012>moby/moby#14012</denchmark-link>
 
 Job error log:
 <denchmark-code>Cannot connect to the Docker daemon at unix:///var/run/docker.sock. Is the docker daemon running?
 time="2019-03-04T05:45:26Z" level=error msg="error waiting for container: unexpected EOF" 
 </denchmark-code>
 
 <denchmark-code>+[05:45:26] echo '[DEBUG] Yarn container exit handler: yarn container exit code: 125'
 </denchmark-code>
